resources.string: Set Google now panel and more
Enable some hidden features at your own risk
When you swipe right from main home screen
When you swipe left from main home screen
Double tap on empty space for power-off
Show search bar in the bottom dock
Use themed icons for search bar
For All Apps & Home screen suggestions
For opening and switching apps anywhere(user must switch to gesture mode first for stable experience)
Toggle to switch between homescreen dock and all apps themed icons
Adds a translucent background to the app dock
Unlock to manage the hidden and protected apps
Please set up a secure lock screen to restrict app access
Hidden apps and their widgets are hidden from the drawer
Protected apps require authentication to be opened from the launcher

1. The amount of blur radius used when rendering non-opaque/transparent background(set to 0 to disable).\n\n2. Changes requires launcher restart, force stopping the launcher or simply swiping/pressing back to main settings after changing configuration/s will trigger the app restart.
Some changes requires launcher restart, force stopping the launcher or simply swiping/pressing back to main settings after changing configuration/s will trigger the app restart.
Enable haptic feedback on recents scroll

string-array.name: welcome_message_variants
string-array.item: #GetRiced 🍚
#Calamares 🦑
#GetCurry 🍲
#UnliRice 🍚
Welcome to riceDroid
Enjoy your stay!
Please enjoy our delicacies 🍚

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_morning
string-array.item: A little walk seems nice.
Brush your teeth mindfully.
Start your day hydrated!
Get some exercise!
Stretch things out!
Try starting your day with positivity.
It is morning right now.
Don\'t forget to check your battery levels!
Please don\'t forget to prepare your breakfast.
Please check the weather, just in case.
Don\'t forget to check your notes!
Remember to check your email/messages.
Please check your schedule if you have one.
You can disable me via home settings.
Toggling the switch can fix stucked responses.
Enjoy a cup of coffee.
Don\'t forget about protein.
Eggs make a simple, nutritious breakfast.
Enjoy your breakfast.

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_noon
string-array.item: Don\'t forget to stay hydrated!
Remember to eat some snacks.
UV rays are more harmful in the afternoon.
It is afternoon right now.
Don\'t forget to check your battery levels!
Remember to check your email/messages.
Please check your to-do list if you have one.
Don\'t forget to prepare your dinner.
You can disable me via home settings.
Toggling the switch can fix stucked responses.
Have some fun.

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_early_evening
string-array.item: Don\'t forget to stay hydrated!
8 hours of sleep is a must.
It is evening right now.
Remember to full charge me before you sleep.
Remember to check your email/messages.
Please check your to-do list if you have one.
Don\'t forget to eat your dinner.
Remember to check the lights and sockets.
You can disable me via home settings.
Toggling the switch can fix stucked responses.
Try to relax and do some rest.

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_evening
string-array.item: Don\'t drink too much water before sleeping.
It is evening right now.
Try to avoid overnight charging if possible.
Remember to check your email/messages.
Please check your to-do list if you have one.
Don\'t forget to eat your dinner.
8 hours of sleep is a must.
You can disable me via home settings.
Toggling the switch can fix stucked responses.
Enjoy your sleep.

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_midnight
string-array.item: Sleep defficiency is bad for your health.
Don\'t forget to stay hydrated.
Being sleep deficit can break melatonin production.
It is midnight right now.
Remember to take consideration for day duties.
You might have a important schedule during the day.
Don\'t forget to sleep/prepare your breakfast.
You can disable me via home settings.
Toggling the switch can fix stucked responses.
Please take care of yourself.

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_random
string-array.item: There are easter eggs hidden on this ROM.
Remember to check the SimplyWeather app.
Try to avoid UV rays during noon.
Stay Hydrated!
You need to take more water during the day.
Laughing can increase bloodflow.
Chocolate contains antioxidants.
Anxiety can make bad smells even worse.
Eating eggs improves your reflexes.
Don\'t forget to eat your lunch.
Don\'t forget to check your battery levels!
Remember to check your email/messages.
Please check your to-do list if you have one.

Toggling the switch can fix stucked responses.
Try pressing support us on about us preference.
Ginataan is food flavored with coconut milk.
The Great Wall of China is held with rice.
All white rice starts brown.
An ice cold drink can refresh you at this hour.
Always bring water, if possible.
Life is short, make it fun.
Enjoy your day!
